title: First report of components responsible for odor sensation from a vertical flow constructed wetland treating combined sewer overflow
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,2013-2019
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00303A, Communication
Ismael L. Vera-Puerto, Shrabana Sarkar, Gianfranco Moris, Hugo Valdés, Marco Quiroz, Juan López, Francisco Encina, Pascal Molle, Carlos A. Arias
A VF CW exhibited low-level production of the components responsible for odor sensation and were similar whether or not VF was operational. VOCs are the only component related to some odor sensation and were higher in the morning.
